mapper.insert: insert into AM_CASE_PARAMETER (ID, CASE_NO, ENTRUSTING_PARTY, CASE_ENTRUST, ENTRUST_NAME, CASE_SEX, CASE_AGE, CASE_CASEDATE, CASE_SITE, CASE_NATURE, CASE_REMARK, CASE_ACCEPTANCE, CASE_DECLINED, CASE_ACCEPTANCE_DATE, EXPERT_CONCLUSION, CASE_PRINCIPAL, COME_APPRAISAL_DATE, TAKES_APPRAISAL_DATE, DNA_NO, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, CODE, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_ID, WHETHER_TO_ENTRUST, AUTHORIZED_AGENCY, SCENE_NA, CASE_ACCEPTANCE_NUMBER, CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, PROVISIONAL_CONCLUSION ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrustingParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseEntrust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{caseSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseAcceptance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseDeclined,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseAcceptanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expertConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{casePrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comeAppraisalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{takesAppraisalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dnaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whetherToEntrust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorizedAgency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sceneNa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseAcceptanceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provisionalConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select ID, CASE_NO, ENTRUSTING_PARTY, CASE_ENTRUST, ENTRUST_NAME, CASE_SEX, CASE_AGE, CASE_CASEDATE, CASE_SITE, CASE_NATURE, CASE_REMARK, CASE_ACCEPTANCE, CASE_DECLINED, CASE_ACCEPTANCE_DATE, EXPERT_CONCLUSION, CASE_PRINCIPAL, COME_APPRAISAL_DATE, TAKES_APPRAISAL_DATE, DNA_NO, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, CODE, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, PERSONAL_ID, WHETHER_TO_ENTRUST, AUTHORIZED_AGENCY, SCENE_NA, CASE_ACCEPTANCE_NUMBER, CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, PROVISIONAL_CONCLUSION from AM_CASE_PARAMETER
